why_deepseek_r1_only.reasoning: R1 meta-analysis of 12 models beats any single model or combination
why_deepseek_r1_only.ncaa_adaptation: Same reasoning patterns apply to college football

configuration.description: DeepSeek R1 analyzes all 12 NCAA models and finds patterns Vegas is missing
workflow: 1. Run all 12 models (xgboost, neural net, bayesian, etc.)
2. DeepSeek R1 analyzes their predictions collectively
4. R1 finds edges that Vegas might be missing
5. R1 provides detailed reasoning for pick

integration.market_data: R1 compares model consensus to Vegas line
integration.ncaa_patterns: R1 aware of conference dynamics, MACtion, big name bias

80%+ confidence.explanation: R1 extremely confident - models agree + edge clear + reasoning strong

75-79% confidence.explanation: R1 confident - good model consensus + identifiable edge

70-74% confidence.explanation: R1 minimum confidence - some edge but uncertainty exists

below 70% confidence.explanation: NO BET - R1 cannot identify sufficient edge

ncaa_specific_considerations.conference_dynamics: R1 analyzes familiarity between conference opponents
ncaa_specific_considerations.big_name_bias: R1 detects when public overvalues Alabama, Ohio State, etc.
ncaa_specific_considerations.look_ahead_spots: R1 detects when team thinking about next week
ncaa_specific_considerations.weather_impact: R1 evaluates wind/weather for passing vs rushing teams

expected_performance.roi_target: 40-50% per season (based on NFL 60.91x over 10 years)

usage.workflow_integration: Runs after 12 models, before bet placement
